topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bbb1863687264df982b00#post_554bbb1863687264df982b00
Conquerors in general tend to be bastards because that is the sort of mind you need to decide that the world belongs to you and fuck anyone who says otherwise.

Bit of terrifying context: Assholes like Hitler and Stalin are our yard stick for evil only because of their historical proximity. If they'd been around five hundred years ago they'd just be a couple more rulers who were dickheads.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554bbcce636872402c630200#post_554bbcce636872402c630200

Another closely related example:

Vlad Tepes: Hundreds of body counts not counting torture, iron fist ruler, regarded by some historians as a religious fanatic as his main reason to join the crusades with the Ottomans being just a cover and later justification to slaughter them.

Branded a National Hero.

Yep. History would be hilarious if not for so many deaths... Maybe still depending on one's sense of humor
